paper_abstract: Nowadays, information gathering in Internet is a complex activity and Internet users need systems to assist them to obtain the information required. In an earlier studies [5, 6, 16] we presented different fuzzy linguistic multi-agent models for helping users in their information gathering processes on the Web. In this paper, we present a new fuzzy linguistic multi-agent model to access information on the Web that incorporates the use of fuzzy multi-granular linguistic modeling to improve it's user-system interaction and be more user-friendly.
paper_title: Improving the user-system interaction in a web multi-agent system using fuzzy multi-granular linguistic information
